SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_user_info a where 1=1 ${queryString}
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: a.id AS id, a.user_name AS userName, a.user_account AS userAccount, a.account_type as accountType, a.org_id AS orgId,a.user_status AS userStatus, a.remark AS remark

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_org_info a where 1=1 ${queryString}
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: a.id AS id, a.org_name AS orgName, a.org_code AS orgCode, a.remark as remark

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_role_info a where 1=1 ${queryString}
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: a.id AS id, a.role_name AS name, a.role_type AS type, a.role_status as status

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_responsibility a where 1=1 ${queryString}
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: a.id AS id, a.name AS name,a.status as status

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_user_resp_r b,t_sys_user_info a where b.user_id=a.id ${queryString}
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: b.id AS id, a.user_name AS userName, a.user_account AS userAccount, a.account_type as accountType, a.org_id AS orgId

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_responsibility a left join (select count(1) as cou,resp_id from t_sys_user_resp_r GROUP BY resp_id)b on a.id=b.resp_id
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: a.id as id,a.name as name,a.create_time as createTime,b.cou as rcount

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: select a.id as qid,b.name as cname,b.id as cid,a.title as qtitle from ask_question a , ask_category b where a.cid = b.id where 1=1
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: a.id as qid,b.name as cname,b.id as cid,a.title as qtitle

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from shw.lore_lexicalentry as a, shw.lore_item_info as b where b.lore_model_id = a.lore_type_id and item_code like '${itemCode}%'
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: a.LEMMA_ID as lemmaId ,a.LEMMA_VERSION_ID as version , a.LORE_TYPE_ID as typeId ,a.LEMMA_CREATE_PER as creator,a.LEMMA_TITLE as title , a.LEMMA_CREATE_TIME as time , a.LEMMA_LAST_UPDATE_TIME as updateTime , a.LEMMA_LAST_UPDATE_PRE as updatePer,a.LEMMA_GRADE as grade , a.LEMMA_ASSESS_SCORE as score ,a.LEMMA_STATE as state , a.LEMMA_CONTEXT as context

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from ask_question a , ask_category b where 1 = 1 and a.cid = b.id ${queryString}
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: a.id as qid,a.answers as answers,a.price as price,b.name as cname,b.id as cid,a.title as qtitle,a.time as qtime,a.status as qstatus

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_base_datasource where 1 = 1 ${queryString}
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: id,name,driver_id as driverId,database_name as databaseName,db_type as dbType

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_base_projectinfo a,t_base_datasource b where a.datasource_id=b.id ${queryString}
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: a.id as id,a.proj_name as name,a.proj_code as code,a.presist_type as presist,a.webframe_id as webFrame,b.name as datasourceName

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_resource_info a,t_sys_resource_resp_r b,t_sys_user_resp_r c where a.id=b.res_id and b.resp_id=c.resp_id and c.user_id=? ORDER BY a.RES_CODE
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: distinct(a.id) as id,a.res_name as name

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_resource_info a,t_org_resource_resp_r b,t_org_user_resp_r c where a.id=b.res_id and b.resp_id=c.resp_id and c.user_id=? ORDER BY a.RES_CODE
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: distinct(a.id) as id,a.res_name as name

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from (select a.* from t_sys_resource_info a,t_sys_resource_role_r b where a.ID=b.RES_ID and b.ROLE_ID in (${roleIds}) and a.STATUS=1 union select c.* from t_sys_resource_info c,t_sys_resource_user_r d where c.id=d.res_id and d.USER_ID=${userId} and c.STATUS=1)e order by res_code
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: id,res_name as name,url,is_leaf as leafTag,res_code as code,pid,seq_no as seqNo

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from (select a.*,0 as assignType from t_sys_resource_info a,t_sys_resource_resp_r b where a.ID=b.RES_ID and b.RESP_ID in (${respIds}) and a.STATUS='1' union select c.*,d.ASSIGN_TYPE as assignType from t_sys_resource_info c,t_sys_resource_user_r d where c.id=d.res_id and d.USER_ID=${userId} and c.STATUS=1)e order by res_code,assignType desc
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: id,res_name as name,url,is_leaf as leafTag,res_code as code,pid,seq_no as seqNo,assignType

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_dept_info
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: id as value,dept_name as text

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_org_info
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: id as value,org_name as text

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_org_info where up_org_id=${id} and org_status=1 order by tree_code
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: id as id,org_name as text

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_org_info where up_org_id=${id}
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: max(tree_code) as code

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_user_info where 1=1 ${queryCondition}
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: id,user_name as name,user_account as account,account_type as accountType,org_id as orgId

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_code a,t_sys_codeset b where a.CS_ID=b.ID and en_name=?
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: a.ITEM_NAME as ITEMNAME,a.ITEM_VALUE as ITEMVALUE

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_org_info a,t_sys_user_org_r b where a.id=b.org_id and b.user_id=?
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: a.id as value,a.org_name as text
